name: spring girls hat
notes:
**spring girls crochet hat free pattern**

crochet this lightweight and airy spring girls hat using acrylic or cotton yarn. it’s a beginner friendly, girly looking hat with ruffle brim. the spring girls hat is a beginner friendly crochet hat available in 3 girl sizes. the hat works top to bottom featuring basic granny style.

**finished sizes:**
6-12 months = 14″ circumference / 6.75″ height with ruffle brim
1-3 toddler = 16″ circumference / 7.5″ height with ruffle brim
3-10 child = 19″ circumference / 8.5″ height with ruffle brim
